backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining risk assessment types and logic to compute a risk score, level, and explanation from age, smoking, and symptom inputs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing short human‑written summaries for major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/CSS variables defining theme colors, dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with landing and assessment routes using AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer with branding, medical disclaimer, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with logo, navigation, and buttons linking to home and assessment pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper composing header, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Disclaimer.tsx: Reusable alert component displaying a detailed medical disclaimer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching an IC actor instance based on user identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and identity state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actor to calculate risk based on assessment input.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentPage.tsx: Implements the health assessment form, validates input, submits data to calculate risk, and displays results.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero section, overview, and navigation to the assessment tool.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the app’s theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, requirements, and image assets for HeartSense AI.
